extension.description: World Weather Online provides global weather forecast and weather content for websites, businesses and travel industry. They specialize in worldwide City and Town, Sailing, Hill and Mountain, Ski and Sports weather. They cover over 2 million worldwide cities. Their weather forecast is trusted and used from SME's to large corporate clients.
世界天气在线提供全球气象预报和网站、商务和旅游业气象信息。特别专注于世界各地的城镇、航海、登山、滑雪和体育天气预报。覆盖全球超过200万的城市。预报信息被从中小企业到大型企业客户所信赖和使用。
